name: Mount Glitch
description:
Edsger is having a bad week. He's in between jobs. His savings are running low. He just swatted a magic bug and is stranded in an unfamiliar world.
Use game-breaking bugs and glitches to get Edsger back home.

A platforming game, inspired by Jump King and Celeste. Made in 3 days for Zeno Jam 5.

This game is hard. But it is achievable.

Time to beat:

qntnt: 3 minutes 13 seconds

Controls

Move Left or Right: A - D

Jump: Space

Grab Wall: Left Shift

Teleport: Enter or Left Mouse Button

Pause/Settings: Escape

Continue Dialogue: Space or Left Mouse Button

Tools

Godot

Dialogic (dialogue engine for Godot)

Credits
